pets.name: Patsy
pets.grooming_style: Traditional Poodle clip with topknot and pom-poms
accessories: Colorful bow tie (pink, lime green, yellow)

physical_characteristics.special_features: Classic Poodle cut with ankle and wrist pom-poms

care_requirements.coat_maintenance: Professional grooming essential to prevent matting
care_requirements.exercise: High energy - needs daily exercise and mental stimulation

nutrition_requirements.special_diet: May need grain-free if allergies present

living_environment.space_requirements: Medium to large home with yard
living_environment.indoor_outdoor: Can be indoor with sufficient exercise

pets.special_notes: Poodles are hypoallergenic and excellent for families with allergies. Their curly coat requires professional grooming every 4-6 weeks to prevent matting. They excel in obedience, agility, and therapy work.

pets.name: Golden Retriever
accessories: White bandana with colorful fish pattern

care_requirements.exercise: High energy - needs 1-2 hours daily exercise

nutrition_requirements.special_diet: May need joint supplements as they age

health_considerations: Prone to hip and elbow dysplasia

living_environment.indoor_outdoor: Can be indoor with sufficient exercise

pets.special_notes: Excellent family dogs, great with other pets and children. They are natural retrievers and love water. Regular exercise and mental stimulation are essential to prevent destructive behavior.

pets.name: Border Collie Mix
accessories: Bow tie with watermelon slice pattern

care_requirements.exercise: Very high energy - needs 2+ hours daily exercise

health_considerations: Regular exercise essential for mental health

living_environment.indoor_outdoor: Needs both indoor and outdoor access
living_environment.apartment_suitable: Not recommended - needs too much exercise

pets.special_notes: One of the most intelligent dog breeds, requires extensive mental and physical stimulation. They need a job to do and can become destructive if bored. Excellent for active families who can provide constant stimulation.

pets.name: Shih Tzu/Havanese Mix

physical_characteristics.coat: Short body fur, longer head/face fur
physical_characteristics.special_features: Salt-and-pepper appearance on chest and muzzle

pets.special_notes: Excellent companion dogs, good for apartment living. They are adaptable and can fit into various family situations. Regular grooming is essential to prevent matting.

pets.name: Exotic Shorthair

physical_characteristics.special_features: Tear staining visible, very flat face

nutrition_requirements.daily_food: 1/4-1/2 cup dry food plus wet food

behavior_characteristics.socialization: Good with families and other pets

health_considerations: Eye problems due to flat face
pets.special_notes: Requires regular eye cleaning due to flat face structure. They are indoor-only cats and should never be allowed outdoors. Good for families who want a calm, affectionate companion.

pets.name: Maine Coon/Siberian Mix
pets.breed: Maine Coon, Siberian, or Norwegian Forest Cat mix

physical_characteristics.coat: Very thick, long fur with silver tips
physical_characteristics.special_features: Frosted appearance, bushy tail with tabby markings

care_requirements.exercise: High energy - needs climbing and play

nutrition_requirements.daily_food: 1/2-1 cup dry food plus wet food

behavior_characteristics.socialization: Good with families and other pets

living_environment.indoor_outdoor: Can be indoor with sufficient stimulation
living_environment.apartment_suitable: Yes, with lots of climbing and play areas

pets.special_notes: Large breed cats require more space and climbing opportunities. They enjoy water and may play in water bowls. Regular grooming is essential to prevent matting of their thick fur.

pets.name: Maltipoo/Bichon Mix

living_environment.indoor_outdoor: Can be indoor with sufficient exercise

pets.special_notes: Hypoallergenic breed, good for allergy sufferers. They are excellent companion dogs and adapt well to different living situations. Regular grooming is essential to maintain their curly coat.

pets.name: Pomeranian
accessories: Dark collar with colorful floral pattern

living_environment.indoor_outdoor: Can be indoor with sufficient exercise

pets.special_notes: Despite small size, they have big personalities and need proper training. They can be vocal and protective. Regular grooming is essential to maintain their thick double coat.

pets.name: Siamese Cat
pets.coat_color: Cream body with dark brown/black points

care_requirements.exercise: High energy - needs play and climbing

nutrition_requirements.daily_food: 1/4-1/2 cup dry food plus wet food

behavior_characteristics.socialization: Good with families and other pets

living_environment.space_requirements: Medium to large home with climbing

pets.special_notes: Very vocal breed, excellent at communicating with owners. They are highly intelligent and need mental stimulation. They form strong bonds with their families and can be quite demanding of attention.

pets.name: Ragdoll
pets.coat_color: Seal point or blue point with white bib

physical_characteristics.special_features: White blaze on forehead, colorpoint pattern

nutrition_requirements.daily_food: 1/2-1 cup dry food plus wet food

behavior_characteristics.socialization: Excellent with families and other pets

pets.special_notes: Known for going limp when held, excellent family cats. They are very gentle and patient with children. They should be indoor-only cats as they lack street smarts.

pets.name: Siberian Kittens
pets.coat_color: Cream body with lynx point markings and blue eyes

care_requirements.exercise: High kitten energy - multiple play sessions

nutrition_requirements.daily_food: High-quality kitten food per vet guidance

pets.special_notes: Siberian kittens are energetic and benefit from early socialization and frequent interactive play.

pets.name: Bengal Cat

nutrition_requirements.special_diet: High moisture to support urinary health

pets.special_notes: Bengals thrive on training and interactive play; provide tall cat trees and regular challenges.

pets.name: Tuxedo Kitten
pets.coat_color: Black with white chest, paws, and muzzle
pets.special_notes: Ensure kitten-proofing at home and provide consistent socialization and vet care.

pets.name: Creative Groom Poodle
pets.coat_color: White with pink creative dye accents
pets.special_notes: Use only pet-safe, non-toxic dyes; avoid dyeing near eyes, ears, or sensitive areas.

pets.name: Norwegian Forest Cat

care_requirements.coat_maintenance: Prevent matting in ruff and breeches

pets.special_notes: Brush the ruff and hindquarters regularly to avoid mats.

pets.name: Mixed-Breed Dog
pets.special_notes: Provide consistent training and outlets for energy to prevent boredom.

pets.name: Toy/Miniature Poodle
pets.special_notes: Regular dental care is essential for toy breeds.

pets.name: Siberian (Neva Masquerade)
pets.coat_color: White/cream with lynx point mask and blue eyes
pets.special_notes: Regular coat maintenance is essential due to dense triple coat.

pets.name: Pomeranian Pair
pets.special_notes: Pair dynamics require individual training and resources to prevent resource guarding.

pets.name: Yorkshire Terrier

care_requirements.brushing: Daily for long coats; several times weekly for clips
care_requirements.coat_maintenance: Regular trims and ear hair care

pets.special_notes: Consistent dental care and positive training are key for Yorkies.

pets.name: Orange Tabby Cat
pets.coat_color: Orange tabby with white chest and paws

nutrition_requirements.special_diet: Weight control if prone to obesity

pets.special_notes: Harness training should be gradual and reward-based to keep the cat comfortable.

grooming.frequency: Varies by breed - from weekly to every 4-6 weeks
grooming.brushing: Daily for long-haired breeds, weekly for short-haired
grooming.bathing: Every 2-8 weeks depending on breed and activity

exercise.mental_stimulation: Puzzle toys, training sessions, interactive games

health.dental_care: Regular teeth cleaning and dental chews
health.vet_visits: Annual check-ups, more frequent for seniors
health.emergency_signs: Lethargy, loss of appetite, vomiting, diarrhea

grooming.bathing: Rarely needed unless dirty or medical condition

health.litter_box: Clean daily, one box per cat plus one extra
health.vet_visits: Annual check-ups, more frequent for seniors
health.emergency_signs: Hiding, loss of appetite, vomiting, diarrhea

dogs: Loss of appetite for more than 24 hours
cats: Loss of appetite for more than 24 hours

dogs: Limit time outdoors in extreme cold
Consider dog coats for short-haired breeds
Increase food slightly for outdoor dogs

litter_box_issues.solutions: Vet check, clean box, reduce stress
